Caption: Photograph contributed by Mr. Anand Singh Bawa, founding editor of Campastimes. This photograph was taken during the wedding of Prof. C.V. Seshadri and Ms. Indumathi with second batch students of IIT Madras.
Description: From Left to Right: Mrs Indumathi, Prof. C.V. Seshadri, Mr. Ramesh A. Vaswani, Mr. R. Venkateswaran “Venkoba”, Mr. Basu John Vetteth, Mr. K. Mahesh, Mr. Srinivas Nageshwar “Shiner”, Mr. K. Narayanan “Ghost”, Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (hidden behind Ghost), Mr. M. Vikram Rao, Mr. B. Ramachandra Pai and Mr. Pritam Lal Kapur.
